meanings.definition: To see or perceive dimly or indistinctly.
meanings.sent1: She squints and scries the distant figure.
meanings.sent2: In the fog, he scries the outline of a ship.
meanings.sent3: As she scries through the fog, she mistakes a tree for a person.
meanings.sent4: His mind scries the future like a crystal ball.
meanings.sent5: The old mirror scries the past with a mysterious glow.

meanings.definition: To make out dimly or indistinctly.
meanings.sent1: He scries the words on the worn-out sign.
meanings.sent2: Through the mist, she scries the shape of a building.
meanings.sent3: Trying to scries the distant mountain, he mixes up its peak with a cloud.
